Judicial System using Blockchain Technology

Judicial System using Blockchain Technology (JSUB) is using Blockchain technology which provides integrity, authentication, confidentiality, and security of data to all the peers on the network. It has no central authority, which makes it a decentralized system. The current problems in the existing Judicial System can be handled efficiently by implementing our System — Accountability & Transparency. Nobody can modify, delete or add a new entry in the past nor deny the existing ones in the System. The amalgamation of the judicial process with Blockchain makes the System more traceable and secure. This will benefit society as nobody will misuse the judicial System for individual advantage.

Features of this project are:
1. Restrict evidence tampering.
2. To make users accountable for handling evidence.
3. The system is not prone to duplication, tampering, and errors related to uploading evidence into the chain.
4. It fulfills the transparency requirement.
5. Ensures Integrity, traceability, and provenance.
6. Reduce delays in decisions.


Description

  • Team Leader | Bachelor Thesis

  • YouTube

  • June 2022 - March 2020

Designed a decentralized peer-to-peer network; comprised entire process of chain of custody involved in a Legal System using Ethereum blockchain, ensures information accessed on blockchain network is guaranteed safe and cannot be tampered.

Accomplished objectives by deploying smart contracts, reducing delay in accessing information, ensuring accountability and transparency, tamper-resistant, immutability, and security of custody of evidence.

Technology

  • Frontend: HTML5

  • Middleware: PythonFlask

  • Backend: Ethereum Network

  • Additionally: IPFS for storage and RemixIDE for SmartContract
